body:
When you write to your council, remember to include: 

- details of the problem and how it is affecting you
- dates of when you contacted your landlord 
- date when you previously contacted the local council 

You can use one of the letter templates on the [Shelter website](https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/downloads_and_tools/sample_letters). 

If you are not happy with the way your housing disrepair problem has been dealt with, you can [make a complaint](/complaints) about your local council.

components.html: **Go [back to the 'What to do now'](/what-to-do-now) page.**

heading: Contact your local council again
lede: If you've had no response from your local council, or you did get a response, but the problem is not fixed or getting worse, you should contact your local council again.
